comprehensive_overview: MultiQC is a reporting tool that collects statistics from multiple bioinformatics analyses and generates a single report. It helps in summarizing the output from various bioinformatics tools in a standardized and consolidated format.
core_features: Aggregates results from various bioinformatics tools into a single report
Supports a wide range of analysis tools and file formats
Generates interactive and visually appealing reports for easier data interpretation
Customizable report templates and modules for adding extra functionality
